ports.name: Type
ports.text: The type of the oscillator: either `sine`, `square`, `triangle`, or `sawtooth`. Also capable of setting the first x number of partials of the oscillator. For example: `sine4` would set be the first 4 partials of the sine wave and `triangle8` would set the first 8 partials of the triangle wave.

ports.name: Phase
ports.text: The phase of the oscillator in degrees

ports.name: Sync Frequency
ports.text: Sync the signal to the Transportâ€™s BPM. Any changes to the transports BPM will also affect the oscillators frequency.

ports.name: Start
ports.text: Start the source at the specified time. If no time is given (`Start Time`), start the source now.

ports.name: Start Time
ports.text: The time when to start after `Start` was triggered

ports.name: Stop
ports.text: Stop the source at the specified time. If no time is given (`Stop Time`), stop the source now.

ports.name: Stop Time
ports.text: The time when to stop after `Stop` was triggered

ports.name: Auto Start
ports.text: Automatically starts the source when the patch is loaded

ports.name: Volume
ports.text: The volume of the output in decibels
